apihelp-query+globalusage-description: Returns global image usage for a certain image.
apihelp-query+globalusage-summary: Returns global image usage for a certain image.
apihelp-query+globalusage-param-prop:
Which properties to return:
;url:Adds url.
;pageid:Adds page ID.
;namespace:Adds namespace ID.
apihelp-query+globalusage-param-filterlo: Filter local usage of the file.
